evidence.claim: Alta RCM Solutions utilizes AWS cloud services for their infrastructure.
The platform is compliant with HIPAA standards, indicating the handling of protected health information.
Integration with EHR systems is supported through FHIR and HL7 protocols.
The company mentions the use of Snowflake for data warehousing solutions.
An emphasis on using Kafka for data streaming and processing within their tech stack.

icp.icp_reason: Alta RCM Solutions focuses on healthcare data exchange, using X12 for claims and eligibility.
